educations.title: New York University - Leonard N. Stern School of Business

given.text: I worked with Rainie in a group project on our competitive strategy class and I have to say she is an amazing person to work with. She was very focused on the task at hand and brought a lot of ideas on how to complete our project. She was definitely an A-player to our project on top of being a great teammate. I believe Rainie can overcome any challenge presented to her. She has the skills, knowledge and most importantly the attitude to do it. See less

Rainie is a very creative and diligent worker who would be an asset to any marketing team. She has the extremely valuable ability to dissect complex data and distill it into actionable information. Her passion and dedication comes through in her work and because of it projects flourish.

received.text:
